short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the Items detailed below (to be delivered to CAAWC Trenton by Jan 2024)
description: The DND requires a Cargo Net assembly for the items listed.
full_summary:
# 600 lbs Cargo Net Assembly Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Title and Details

- **Tender Title**: 600 lbs Cargo Net Assembly
- **Reference Number**: cb-723-78561818
- **Solicitation Number**: W8485-226663/A
- **Amendment Number**: 5
- **Publication Date**: October 12, 2023
- **Closing Date**: November 16, 2023, 2:00 PM ET
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: December 20, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2024

## Tender Classification and Category

* **UNSPSC Classification**: *Air Transportation Support Systems and Equipment
* **Contracting Category**: *Goods and Services

## Tender Details

* **Trade Agreements**: *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* ** Regions of Opportunity**: World
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (except National Capital Region)
* **Delivery Address**: CAAWC Trenton
* **Expected Delivery Date**: January 2024
* **Quantity**: 40 items

## Equivalent or Substitute Product Notice

Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must provide brand name and model number, or Part Number and NCAGE code for the product being offered.

## Language Notice

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Audrée Poissant-Viau
* **Contact Email**: [audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca](mailto:audree.poissant-viau@forces.gc.ca)
* **Contact Phone**: 00
* **Contact Fax**: None

## Notice and Attachment

Notice available on the Canada Buys website [here](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21976/w8485-226663---.request-for-proposal-canada-buys.pdf).

## Tender Description

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed above. Bidders are strongly encouraged to transmit their bids electronically using the epost Connect service.

The government is seeking bids for 600 lbs Cargo Net assemblies with 40 units required. Essential tender details are listed above, including delivery requirements, expected start and end dates, and attachment documents. The Canada Buys website maintains an online copy of the notice and attachment. Interested bidders should follow the provided contact information to inquire about submission details.  [Attachments to
